revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=WatchGuard |model=AP100 |asin=B00HWI3D8O |newegg=9B-0XK-001Z-00005 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model=CAP2100AG |availability=EoL (12/31/2019) |fcc_date=12/26/2012 |fcc_id=U2M-CAP2100AG,U2M-CAP4200AG |ic_id=3616C-CAP2100AG |pcb_id=7016A0507001 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af/at |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;3;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier w/Power Detector;SiGe;SE2537L;;2;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, 2.4GHz High-Gain Power Amplifier;Silicon Storage Technology;SST12LP15A;;2; |flags=PoE in |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31; |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=00:90:7F |oui_eth=00:90:7F }} {{TagLine|WatchGuard AP100 Indoor Access Point}} :[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/AP100_200_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide] "7016A0507001 Ver: 1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|Senao CAP4200AG|Senao}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9344 [[MIPS 74K]] (@533MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9344 (802.11abgn) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power: 12V, 1.25A via barrel or 802.3af/at PoE ==Images== ---- File:WatchGuard AP100 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:WatchGuard AP100 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
